titles.title: Protect Our Refuges Act of 2019
Protect Our Refuges Act of 2019
A bill to amend the National Wildlife Refuge System Administration Act of 1966 to prohibit the use of neonicotinoids in National Wildlife Refuges, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Protect Our Refuges Act of 2019
This bill prohibits the use of neonicotinoids (a class of neuroactive insecticides that are chemically similar to nicotine) within the National Wildlife Refuge System.
